content2.title: Grow to ESG Strategy for Sustainability in Business

card.title: Environment
card.subtitle: The company operates its business with responsibility to all groups of stakeholders and society as a whole. Give importance to human resource development both inside and outside the company. Encourage employees to develop Potential and advancement in work knowledge support or activities in the community to improve the quality of life run business with the aim that the industry can co-exist with the community and happy society and raise the quality of society together

card.title: Social
card.subtitle: The company operates its business with attention to the impact on the environment. meet opportunities and challenges effectively preventing business from environmental factors such as climate change limited natural resources by supporting and promoting the cost-effective and efficient use of resources, as well as supporting environmentally friendly business operations. and support environmental activities

card.title: Governance
card.subtitle: The company will conduct business in accordance with the principles of ethics in business operations. Fostering a strong corporate governance and risk management culture Under the framework of business ethics and support guidelines for compliance with laws, rules, regulations, methods, international standards and anti-corruption guidelines. Including transparent and verifiable operations.

content3.title: Sustainable Development Policy
content3.subtitle: The company aims to create a balance between the business operations of the organization. And take into account the economic, social and environmental impacts that occur throughout the business chain. and bring the knowledge gained from business operations to transfer to the stakeholders All stakeholders to contribute to society and sustainability The Company therefore has established a sustainable development policy as a guideline for business operations of the Company and its subsidiaries. that covers various important points
